alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 05 at 2:52AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Arizona, including the following county, Gila. * WHEN...Until 945 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of Tonto Creek continues. Low-water crossings may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 249 AM MST, flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - A streamflow gauge on Tonto Creek, upstream from Tonto Basin, continues above action stage with a gauge height measured at 4.72 feet as of 200 AM MST. Low water crossings in Tonto Basin, including A Crossing, Bar X Crossing, and Store Crossing will be impassable while flow remains above action stage. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tonto Basin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
